sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FizzBuzzService } from './fizz-buzz.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fizzbuzz', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { seriesFB: any; randomNumber!: number; limit!: number; randomN!: number; constructor(private fizzBuzzService: FizzBuzzService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } generateSeries(): void { this.fizzBuzzService.getFizzBuzzSeries(this.randomNumber, this.limit).subscribe((series: any) => { this.seriesFB = series; }); } generateRandom(min =1, max=100) { this.randomNumber= Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min; } formIsValid() { return this.limit > this.randomNumber; } isNumber(val: any): boolean { return typeof val === 'number'; } }
